thing-type.label: DW-SS Door/Window Contact
thing-type.description: Door/Window Contact<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtRing Alarm Contact Sensor: Expand your Ring Alarm system to secure each door and window in your home, and get alerts as soon as they open.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtActivate inclusion mode on controller</li&gt <li&gtPull tab/quickly disconnect and reconnect battery</li&gt <li&gtDevice should appear in Inbox</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtInitiate exclusion mode on controller</li&gt <li&gtOpen contact sensor’s cover Remove and replace battery quickly</li&gt </ol&gt<p&gtReset:</p&gt <ol&gt<li&gtOpen contact sensor’s cover</li&gt <li&gtPress and hold the reset button on sensor circuitry</li&gt <li&gtRemove and replace battery quickly – Blue LED will start to blink rapidly</li&gt <li&gtWait for the blue LED to stop blinking</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtBy opening the top cover, the sensor will get to tamper state and stay awake.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_2
parameter.label: 1: Wait time
parameter.description: Time between sending unsolicited battery reports<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt255 to 4200 seconds <strong&gtin 255 second increments</strong&gt that the sensor should wait between sending unsolicited battery reports. <br /&gtThe default configuration value for parameter 1 is defaulted to 4200 seconds on exclusion.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: group_2
parameter.label: 2: Basic Report
parameter.description: Basic report of either 0x00 for CLOSED or 0xFF for OPEN<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtWhen a node is associated with Group 2, the sensor will send a basic report of either 0x00 for “Closed” or 0xFF for “Open.” </p&gt
